message.name: ERR_ADMINCASEROLE_MRE
message.locale: More than one case administration role exists for case %1s with status %2s and type %3s and user ID %4s.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FREQUENCY_NO_REVIEWER
message.locale: A reviewer must be selected to modify the case review frequency.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FV_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: A scheduled start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_CASE_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot modify review frequency if case status is not Active or Approved.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_ESD_LARGE
message.locale: Scheduled start date can not be later than scheduled end date.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_SCHEDULEDSTARTDATE_CASESTART
message.locale: The Case Review scheduled start date must not be earlier than case start date (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_SCHEDULESTARTDATE_NODATE
message.locale: A Starting From date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEWSCHEDULE_FV_STARTDATE_CURRENTDATE
message.locale: The review schedule cannot start before today's date.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEWSCHEDULE_XRV_STARTDATE_CASE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The review schedule cannot start after the expected end date of the case (%1d).

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED_END
message.locale: End date: %1s

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED_EXPECTED_END
message.locale: Expected end date: %1s

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED_INFO
message.locale: Case review for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been created. Amended review information:

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED_SCHECDULED_START
message.locale: Scheduled start date: %1s

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED_START
message.locale: Start date: %1s

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEWER_UPDATE
message.locale: CaseReview of %1s for %2s has been reassigned to %3s by %4s.

message.name: INF_CASEREVIEW_ENDDATE_OUTCOME
message.locale: A review end date has been recorded, therefore you must enter an outcome.

message.name: INF_CASEREVIEW_STATUS_CLOSED_UPDATE
message.locale: CaseReview of %1s for %2s has been completed by %3s.

message.name: INF_CASEREVIEWOUTCOME_ENDDATE
message.locale: An outcome has been recorded, therefore you must enter the review end date.

message.name: INF_CASEREVIEWOUTCOME_STARTDATE
message.locale: An outcome has been recorded, therefore you must enter the review start date.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_SCHEDULESTARTDATE_SYSTEMDATE
message.locale: A case review cannot be created in the past.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FV_ACTUALSTARTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: An actual start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_ACTUALSTARTDATE_LARGE
message.locale: Actual start date can not be later than actual end date.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FV_CASEREASON_EMPTY
message.locale: A case reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FV_REVIEWSTARTDATE
message.locale: When modifying a case review start date, it must be changed to today's date or to a date in the future.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_XFV_SET_REVIEWER
message.locale: Only one reviewer can review a case. Please select a reviewer or search for another user to perform the review.

message.name: ERR_CASEREVIEW_FV_REVIEWER_EMPTY
message.locale: A reviewer must be entered. Please select a reviewer or search for another user to perform the review.
